title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 

(6A)) (Covid-19) (No.3) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 20th day of 

December 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a (6a)) (covid-19) (no.3) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 20th day december 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The following provisions of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
2. The following provisions of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 
2021), being penal provisions for the purposes of section 31A of the Health Act 
1947 (No. 28 of 1947), are prescribed to be relevant provisions for the 
purposes of the Criminal Justice (Enforcement Powers) (Covid-19) Act 2020 
(No. 14 of 2020): 

(a) 

paragraph (1) of Regulation 12; 

(b) paragraphs (1), (2) and (3) of Regulation 13; 

(c) 

paragraph (1) of Regulation 13A; 

(d) paragraph (1) of Regulation 13B; 

(e) 

(f) 

paragraph (1) of Regulation 13C; 

paragraph (1) of Regulation 13D. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [738] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 December, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [738]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These regulations provide for the penal provisions relating to premises licensed 
for the sale or supply of intoxicating liquor for consumption on the premises 
under the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) to become relevant provisions 
for the purposes of the Criminal Justice (Enforcement Powers) (Covid-19) Act
